title: Mypet插件怎么给予某个玩家某个动物的权限
author: LiMaofan

replies.author: 红菜头糕
replies.txt_content: manuaddp 玩家 MyPet.user.leash.动物种类

replies.author: LiMaofan
replies.txt_content: 就是看了这个会才来问的

replies.author: (兜兜）
replies.txt_content:
LiMaofan 发表于 2015-12-6 01:09
就是看了这个会才来问的
看不懂么？

replies.author: (兜兜）
replies.txt_content:
LiMaofan 发表于 2015-12-6 01:09
就是看了这个会才来问的
你没有把- MyPet.user.leash.<MyPet-物种>- MyPet.user.keep.<MyPet-物种>权限写入玩家组里！

replies.author: LiMaofan
replies.txt_content: 这个是给所有玩家，怎么给单独某个玩家的权限

replies.author: LiMaofan
replies.txt_content: 不是给所有玩家权限，怎么才能只给某个玩家权限

replies.author: Deeplovelyx
replies.txt_content: 比如我要给玩家抓猪权限就输入MyPet.user.keep.pig以此类推
